title: Volcano (South Park)
summary: "Volcano" is the third episode of the first season of the American animated television series South Park. It originally aired on Comedy Central in the United States on August 27, 1997.[2] In the episode, Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny go on a hunting trip with Stan's uncle Jimbo and his war buddy Ned. While on the trip, Stan is frustrated by his unwillingness to shoot a living creature and Cartman tries to scare the hunting party with tales of a creature named Scuzzlebutt. Meanwhile, the group is unaware that a nearby volcano is about to erupt.
